name: Ground Stroke
description:
Imagine there was a tennis mini game with simple controls, but tense gameplay, that works inside the Gameboy's limitations, but dances on their very edge to reach the absolute maximum of effects and graphics, made in an untypical, yet charming art style by a professional pixel artist with experience in GB Studio and has you play as a cute cat as topping of the cake.

Or actually, stop dreaming and play the game right now, for ever for free, right here inside your browser tab!

Controls:
Move with WASD or arrow keys
Interact (A-key): Space, Enter, Q, E, Y, X, Y, Z

This game uses sound effects that can be turned off on your browser window and no music, sparing me work and making you able to listen to music while playing.

In the download files you'll find a ZIP folder called groundstroke_1.0_rom . It's the Gameboy ROM that can be used to play this game on original hardware!

There is a hidden screen with some developer commentary for anyone interested.

More Gameboy-related content by me and my friends:
>My GB Studio game "Stainless"
>A GB-themed tennis game by my friend Batfeula
>"Mud Warriors", one of many GB games by my friend Polyducks
>GB sprites and tiles by my friend BeachBoogeyman
